title: Biophoton Experiment Metadata
description: Schema for metadata associated with a biophoton count experiment.

experimentId.description: A unique identifier for the experiment.

sensorType.description: The type of sensor used for the measurement.

timestamp.description: The ISO 8601 timestamp of when the experiment was conducted.

location.description: The geographical location of the experiment.

calibrationData.description: Key-value pairs of calibration data for the sensor.

tags.description: Optional free-form tags to describe the experiment.
